QuestData.Title: Old Man Thistle's Treasure
QuestData.Description: Well high golly! This is turning into a real life treasure hunt!$B$BThere's gotta be some kind of entrance or opening to the north, where the mountains meet Cattail Lake.$B$BI'll meet ya at the entrance! Let's go get that treasure!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the cave entrance and recover Old Man Thistle's hidden treasure.
